mapper.select: select FILE_NO, FILE_ORIGIN, FILE_PRIORT, FILE_NM, FILE_EXTSN, FILE_FLPTH from filemaster where file_no = #{fileNo}
mapper.update: update notice_board set NTBD_RDCNT = NTBD_RDCNT + 1 where NTBD_NO = #{NTBD_NO}
mapper.select: select NTBD_NO, NTBD_SJ, NTBD_CN, NTBD_WRITER, NTBD_DAY, NTBD_RDCNT, n.NTBD_IPCR_AT, NTBD_UPDDE, e.EMP_NM, FILE_NO, FILE_ORIGIN, FILE_PRIORT, FILE_NM, FILE_EXTSN, FILE_FLPTH from notice_board n left outer join filemaster f on (n.ntbd_no = f.file_origin) left outer join employee e on (n.NTBD_WRITER = e.EMP_NO) where NTBD_NO = #{NTBD_NO}
select FILE_NO, FILE_ORIGIN, FILE_PRIORT, FILE_NM, FILE_EXTSN, FILE_FLPTH from filemaster where FILE_NO = #{fileNo}
